data.question: What is the name of the zirconium-based metal-organic framework discussed in the text?
What organic linker is used in the synthesis of MIP-202(Zr)?
What property of MIP-202(Zr) makes it an excellent proton conductor?
data.answer: The presence of protonated amino groups exposed in the pores

data.question: Is MIP-202(Zr) stable in working conditions over a period of one week?
What method provides insight into the hydrogen bond network of MIP-202(Zr)?
Does the synthesis of MIP-202(Zr) involve toxic chemicals?
What is the proton conductivity of MIP-202(Zr) at 363 K and under 95% relative humidity?
What is the space-time yield of the synthesis procedure for MIP-202(Zr)?
Is the crystal structure of MIP-202(Zr) isostructural with that of MOF-801?
What is the effect of acidic and alkaline conditions on the N2 sorption analysis of MIP-202(Zr)?
data.answer: The uptake significantly increases after the treatment, especially in acidic and alkaline conditions

data.question: What is the effect of removing Cl- from the pores of MIP-202(Zr)?
data.answer: It frees up a significant amount of space within the pores

data.question: Does the treatment of MIP-202(Zr) with HCl lead to the formation of defects?
What is the Cl/Zr ratio in MIP-202(Zr) after Soxhlet extraction with water for three days?
What is the proton conductivity of MIP-202(Zr) with a Cl/Zr ratio of 3/7 under the same testing condition reported in the main text?
Is the proton conductivity of MIP-202(Zr) affected by the presence of Cl- in the pore?
What is the activation energy associated with the Grotthus-like mechanism for proton transport in MIP-202(Zr)?
Does MIP-202(Zr) maintain its crystallinity after being soaked in 50%wt H2O2 without adding any Fe(II) salts?
What is the space-time yield of MIP-202(Zr) for a scale-up reaction that produced more than 30 g of sample?
Is MIP-202(Zr) stable under strong oxidative conditions?
What is the significance of the proton conductivity value of MIP-202(Zr) compared to the state-of-the-art conductivity observed in several MOFs?
data.answer: MIP-202(Zr)'s conductivity is not significant compared to the state-of-the-art conductivity (>0.1 S cm-1) observed in several MOFs
